page.title: 13Living on a farm
page.content:
Usually I have to get up and feed the horses,pigs,dogs,cats and cows.Then I have to get dressed for school.I walk up to Joanne's.When I come home from school I go up and see the rabbits. Yesterday I could not see them because I was at the Royal Show but I went up this morning.We have some new piglets but we have to sell them because we are moving.
I enjoy living on a farm because I help my dad take engines out of tractors.We have got 3 tractors and 1 digger. Our oldest tractor is 20 to 25 years old. Stuart and I help my dad tidy out his yard.In return he lets us wash our bikes.Then we go and get them dirty again.
